original_title: UFC Fight Night: Miocic vs. Maldonado
overview: The Ultimate Fighter Brazil 3 Finale: Miocic vs Maldonado (also known as UFC Fight Night: Miocic vs. Maldonado) was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship. It took place on May 31, 2014 at the Ginásio do Ibirapuera arena in São Paulo, Brazil.
title: UFC Fight Night: Miocic vs. Maldonado
